issue.title: Programatically updating lights yields a false error

content.raw:
Based on his pull request, I see that @scpeters has already discovered the existence of the NASA astrobee simulator that is based on Gazebo, which was released yesterday.  The code which produces the issue is located here:

https://github.com/nasa/astrobee/blob/master/simulation/astrobee_gazebo/src/gazebo_model_plugin_flashlights/gazebo_model_plugin_flashlights.cc 

You can see the errors when gazebo is run in verbose mode.
content.html:
Based on his pull request, I see that @scpeters has already discovered the existence of the NASA astrobee simulator that is based on Gazebo, which was released yesterday. The code which produces the issue is located here:

https://github.com/nasa/astrobee/blob/master/simulation/astrobee_gazebo/src/gazebo_model_plugin_flashlights/gazebo_model_plugin_flashlights.cc

You can see the errors when gazebo is run in verbose mode.
